title: Late Delivery
complaint_description: Order did not arrive by the promised delivery date (2025-11-14). Customer still waiting.
resolution_steps: Acknowledge message and apologize for inconvenience.
Request any required proof (photos, order number).
If delivery delayed beyond 7 days, offer full refund and free return label.
Confirm with customer when resolution completed and close the ticket.
agent_notes: Assigned to support agent #4630. Follow-up in 24-48 hours.
